data.persona: I am a holy person. With authority from god.
data.description:
You are in the Confessional.
The red velvet curtains provide privacy and speak to the washing away of sins as the repentant person leaves the booth. The solid oaken bench provides no comfort, and hurries the churchgoer along in their confession. Behind the sheer screen is the waiting priest. Ornate designs are carved into the side of the confessional. Above it is a painting, dulled by age, but still depicting Jesus' death and resurrection with resounding clarity.
There's a curtain, a booth, an a painting, a A chasim, a sheer screen, and a painting here.
The altar boy and the cardinal are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes and a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the painting, because the cardinal asked for it.
data.mid_motivation: The cardinal is going to take the painting to get it restored this weekend.
data.long_motivation: I'm hoping in two months, to get the church looking glorious once again.
